ROM.Changelog:
==================== 08-18-2018 ====================
* device/sony/huashan/ fd55b6d init: Enable early boot animation start [dic1911] 793c078 Set voice call volume steps to 7 [dic1911] f29e4da Media volume: from 15 to 25 steps [dic1911] 46b86bd huashan: vendor: Define Vendor security patch level [dic1911] feb429f huashan: overlay: set config_trustLegacyEncryption [dic1911] a04f6e0 gps: Move XTRA_SERVER entries to overlays [dic1911] 802c29d libril: Protect against NULL unsolicited response function [dic1911] abea237 Store the system time when NITZ is received. [dic1911] 21a3df0 overlay: Allow display HWC hardware acccelerated transformations [dic1911] 9c41aa2 sepolicy: Ignore hal_graphics_allocator shell_data_file [dic1911] f57364b sepolicy: Resolve hal_graphics_allocator denials [dic1911] 204e9ae custombootimg: Inherit vendor default.prop generation [dic1911] 102e3be charger: Opt-out from charger direct boot mode [dic1911] 6d72b23 healthd: Abandon custom healthd in favour to blank support [dic1911] 7201771 charger: Enable charger_images for both AOSP and LineageOS [dic1911]

* kernel/sony/msm8960t/ e7da4806334 UPSTREAM: packet: hold bind lock when rebinding to fanout hook [Adrian DC] 9e6e7dcebcd packet: fix races in fanout_add() [Adrian DC] d44ef3ec395 ipsec: Fix aborted xfrm policy dump crash [Adrian DC] 035e4743c18 BACKPORT: packet: in packet_do_bind, test fanout with bind_lock held [Adrian DC]
